name: TigerVespamon
description: TigerVespamon is Cyborg Digimon with a humanoid body structure. It wears yellow armor with black stripes resembling a bee; glimpses of its metallic body can be seen in the gaps in its armor, particularly around its upper arms. It has a "V" on the forehead of its helmet and four light blue wings on its back. It also wears a red, scarf-like object around its neck. It wields two glowing blue energy blades as weapons.
